dialogue: Yes! Trust me, you won't regret it!
Just as Spirit is about to comment,
she hears a gunshot and feels a sharp pain in her leg.
She begins falling and sees Shoju get hit too
and fall down with blood splurting from his chest.
While it's a shame that you didn't join us,
it would be remiss of me to let you
just go ahead and ally with an Army soldier.
The one who fired the gun walks up to Spirit.
So, I'm afraid this is goodbye~
The last thing Spirit sees is the gun pointed
at her face, before Taquil pulls the trigger.
